summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, focuses on creating affordable, innovative products like smartphones and IoT devices. With a mission to provide technology for a better life, Xiaomi emphasizes quality, affordability, and innovation. Their three core tenets are technology-driven, cost-effective, and cool products. Future strategies include redefining entrepreneurship, integrating internet with manufacturing, and ensuring steady progress. Xiaomi aims to lead in innovation, smart living, and manufacturing advancements, becoming a global force in shaping future lifestyles.
